metadata.title: Tuesday, 5th November, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication, why the Government has not yet provided protective clothing to its employees working on the Mapungu-Kalabo Road in Kalabo Central Parliamentary Constituency.

parts: (a)whether the Government has any plans to create a farming block along the Zambezi River in Sesheke Parliamentary Constituency in order to encourage farming in the area; and
(b)if there are no such plans, how the Government intends to reduce poverty in the Constituency.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water
parts: (f)Nakanyaa. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply:  Resumption of Debate: (Head 02/01: under consideration): (The Vice President). questions.question_text: Development when the following primary schools in Nalikwanda Parliamentary Constituency will be provided with solar power:
